properties.address: Mormond West Parish Church (formerly Strichen Parish Church), Fraserburgh, Aberdeenshire AB43 6SR
properties.description: Sharing Larder - Mondays Wednesdays and Saturdays 10-11 am Open to all - reducing food waste with local farm/allotment produce available. Soup's on Lunch - 2nd and 4th Thursday each month 12 -1.30 pm The space is open to all providing a warm bowl of soup, tea/coffee and biscuits in a relaxing warm space. Cafe Retreat 3rd Thursday each month 2-4 pm Anyone looking to get out of their house, living with long term medical conditions and carers looking for some respite. Tea/coffee and homebakes. Crafting activities/cards/dominoes available
